function ERI_EP04_21()
    --.結-3【12月第4週】「露悪」
    SaveData.Title = "露悪"

    --//BG：選挙ステージ
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    MSG([[ After the Princess Election with Daria, preparations began to redecorate the main auditorium for the annual event, the "Holy Night Festival." ]])

    MSG([[ At Yuriai Private Academy, there is a lingering tradition from its days as a mission school, and even now they hold a Christmas celebration as a customary event. ]])

    MSG([[ Because the venue is shared with the Princess Election and held on the same day, it’s hectic with things like moving the piano and other equipment back to their original positions after they were moved for the election stage, and decorating the walls with ribbons and wreaths. ]])
    --//BU：リラ（悲しみ）、ヒユ（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07da")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0513.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】悲しみ
 "Ugh! Geez! There’s too much to do! Not enough hands!" ]])

    MSG([[ As soon as Lira finished carrying the piano onto the stage, she looked up at the ceiling and shouted. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0514.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】真剣
 "Where did Hermes-chan Senpai and Daria Paisen's knights go? Leaving it all to underclassmen and just playing around?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1188.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】苦笑・汗
 "It seems Hermes formed a school anthem choir—not a choir per se—but the knights were asked to join, and they’re doing their final rehearsal right now." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0515.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】悲しみ
 "What’s that about... Seriously lame." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0322.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】悲しみ
 "Hyaaah... There’s not even time to praise Erika-Onee-sama’s victory." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1189.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】笑顔
 "Let’s do our best. The boys’ division is helping out, too." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006",1000,false)

    --//BG：大講堂（正面）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020aa")
    --//BU：オウガ（高笑い）、先輩たち（興奮）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01pa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0288.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】高笑い
 "Alright, ladies! Bring on any heavy labor worthy of my physique!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0289.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】高笑い
 "Weaklings among you should only carry things lighter than chopsticks! Haaaah ha ha ha!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0079.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】興奮
 "To be able to participate in Yuriai Private Academy’s Holy Night Festival!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0052.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】興奮
 "Such a thing was unthinkable a year ago!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0060.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】興奮
 "Heh heh heh... Looks like this year we won’t have to rely on charity." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//BU：ウラン（笑顔）、モブ女子生徒Ｃ×２
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,200,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(60,800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0340.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】笑顔
 "Erika-san, we also invited everyone besides the 'knights' to come help." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1190.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】笑顔
 "Wow! Thank you so much, Uran-san! That’s a huge help!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0133.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "If Erika-hime says she’s in trouble, we just can’t ignore it!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0134.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "The match with Daria-onee-sama was truly beautiful. We’re looking forward to your future achievements." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ja")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1191.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】泣き笑い
 "...Thank you very much. I’m truly happy." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Moved by all the genuine kindness of those helping, I almost began to cry. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Once again, I realized how loved the persona “Erika Ikusa,” created with Akira, truly was. ]])

    MSG([[ But this daily life will end soon. ]])

    MSG([[ If I can save Sister Marika, the Battle Princess “Erika Ikusa” will have fulfilled her role and will disappear from this world. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1192.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】悲しみ
 "Huh...? Why am I... crying?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Noticing tears streaming down my cheek, I quietly wiped them away so no one would see. ]])

    MSG([[ As Erika Ikusa, I have experienced many difficulties. By day a girl, by night a boy, living a double life at the same school. ]])

    MSG([[ There wasn’t a single easy day. Each day I wished I could stop cross-dressing. Battling with my true desire to be more manly tore my heart apart. ]])

    MSG([[ And yet—why do tears keep flowing? ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1193.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】悲しみ
 (I shouldn’t think about what’s ahead right now. I’ll wait until Daria apologizes and my sister wakes up before worrying about it.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I wiped my overflowing tears forcefully with my sleeve and resumed decorating the main auditorium. ]])
    --　　　◆
STOP_BGM(2000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    --//BG：選挙ステージ
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ That evening. We managed to finish preparations just in time, and the Holy Night Festival started as planned. ]])

    --//BU：エリカ（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01hb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ And somehow, I was standing once again at the center of the stage to give the opening greeting. ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav")

    MSG([[ Though normally Hermes, the true imperial princess, should have done this, she named me at the last minute since I was the star who energized the Princess Election. ]])

    MSG([[ Honestly, I was troubled by this suddenly thrust role, but I couldn’t betray their expectations. Desperately racking my brain, I managed to organize my greeting. ]])

    MSG([[ Feeling a different kind of tension from the election, I stepped forward to the front of the stage and bowed once. ]])

    MSG([[ Then I spoke my honest feelings. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1194.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】笑顔
 "Good evening, everyone. I am Erika Ikusa, a student from class 1-A, and I’ve been asked to give the opening greeting for this year's 'Holy Night Festival' on short notice." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1195.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】苦笑
 "Since I was running around on this stage just a few hours ago, many of you might know me already... but if I may, let me briefly introduce myself first." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1196.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】通常
 "Before entering Yuriai Private Academy, I knew nothing about it. I was so clueless that I didn’t even know about the 'Four Princesses' or the 'knight' system." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1197.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】苦笑
 "When I first enrolled, I still remember being taught about seniority by Lira-san, who was competing for the 'Hime' position then. Thank you for that, Lira-san." ]])

    --//SE：笑い声
--PLAY_SE("SEf014.wav",0,false,0.3)

    MSG([[ Though my mind was blank with nervousness, my words did not falter. When I opened my mouth, my feelings naturally came out. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1198.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】笑顔
 "The reason I’ve been able to do my best as a 'Hime' is all thanks to everyone." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1199.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】笑顔
 "I am prepared to devote myself completely for everyone at this academy because... because I—" ]])

    MSG([[ As I spoke, I realized the reason for my earlier tears. Maybe deep down, I had known from the start. ]])

    MSG([[ Thinking that this double life will soon end, it’s only natural for tears to flow. ]])

    MSG([[ Because I— ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01ja")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1200.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】泣き笑い
 "...love Yuriai Private Academy very much. On this holy night, I sincerely hope more of your wishes come true." ]])

    MSG([[ Before I knew it, I had come to love the life of 'Erika Ikusa' as well. ]])

    --//SE：拍手（MAX)
PLAY_SE("SEa019.wav")

    MSG([[ But I cannot betray the trust of so many people any further. ]])

    MSG([[ Receiving thunderous applause from the entire hall, I renewed my resolve. ]])

    MSG([[ Once this is all over, I will confess everything about cross-dressing to everyone— ]])

    STOP_SE("SEa019.wav",500)
PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0015.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "You really know how to move people, don’t you?" ]])
    --//ネメシア

STOP_BGM(1500)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1201.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】焦り
 "—! ?" ]])

    MSG([[ Feeling a presence immediately behind me, I turned around. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",300,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG024aa")
    --//BU：ネメシア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",300,false)


    MSG([[ There stood Nemesia Himegami, whom I had encountered before the Princess Election. ]])

    MSG([[ The sudden appearance made my heart race. ]])

    MSG([[ It wasn’t just that this was an unexpected arrival; I was most surprised that I hadn’t even noticed her approach to this close proximity. ]])

    MSG([[ Even a master-level martial artist wouldn’t easily erase their presence this well. Who exactly was this person? ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0016.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】通常
 "Oh my~ Why so nervous? I just came to praise the beautiful girl who defeated Daria." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1202.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 "T-Thank you for praising me." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0017.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】通常
 "Sorry to the others too. I had something I really wanted to say and couldn’t help but get ahead of myself<sprite="Emoji" name="star">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0018.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】通常
 "After all, I thoroughly trained my proud daughter, and a first-year student defeated her, right? Really amazing." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0019.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】通常
 "Now, let’s praise this outstanding beauty again<sprite="Emoji" name="note">—the amazing Erika Ikusa<sprite="Emoji" name="star">." ]])

    --//SE：拍手（中）
PLAY_SE("SEa021.wav")

    MSG([[ At Nemesia’s words, applause erupted. Did she truly come only to praise me…? ]])

    MSG([[ Feeling uneasy and doubting her true feelings, I found myself watching her expression carefully. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0020.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】通常
 "Is spying one of your hobbies?" ]])

    STOP_SE("SEa021.wav",1000)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,200,Ease.InCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,1000,0,300,Ease.InCubic)
    WAIT(300)
    --//BU：無し
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")


    MSG([[ In the next moment, Nemesia vanished from sight— ]])

    --//CG：晒された戦姫の正体（エフェクト）

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0021.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "Farewell, Minato Ikusa-kun." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV023aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask032" , 300,false)

    MSG([[ As she whispered by my ear, something passed through the center of my body. ]])

    --//CG：晒された戦姫の正体（エフェクト消失）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV023ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ My head felt light. My chest felt cool. Looking down, I saw my familiar flat chest. ]])

    MSG([[ And my usual wig was lying on the floor, the hair spread out. The usual feeling of hair on the sides and back was gone. ]])

    MSG([[ That’s strange. I should be cross-dressing now. My chest should be fuller, and my hair should be long. ]])

    MSG([[ Why is my true face exposed? My head couldn’t keep up. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0022.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "Oh my, what a surprise!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0023.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "The princess representing Yuriai Private Academy, Erika Ikusa, is actually Minato Ikusa, a boy from the boys’ division~~~~~<sprite="Emoji" name="star">" ]])

    MSG([[ Nemesia was saying something right beside me. ]])

    MSG([[ A distant sounding scream. The shadow of someone rushing over from the audience. ]])

    MSG([[ Yelling. ]])

    MSG([[ Screaming. ]])

    MSG([[ Wailing. ]])

    MSG([[ The whole world felt distant, like it was somebody else’s problem. ]])

    MSG([[ This must be a dream. A bad dream. ]])

    --//BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 2000,false)

    --//SE：床に倒れる音
PLAY_SE("SEc019.wav")
WAIT(300)

    MSG([[ Thinking that, I collapsed right there. ]])

    MSG([[ The pain of hitting the floor with my whole body shot through me. ]])

    MSG([[ A painfully vivid, real pain. ]])
    --　　　　◆

    -- 19	暗転	『エリカ』ルート第４章をクリアした
    UNLOCK_TROPHY(19)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERI_EP05_01")
end
